title: Mobile Intensive Intervention Program for Working Adults with Mathematics Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A customized intervention program to address deficiencies in essential mathematical concepts for science-related tasks, combining daily 30-minute digital device-based sessions with weekly game activities.

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic math concepts (fractions, ratios, graph interpretation, etc.) required for solving science job-related problems with over 80% accuracy
Learners can perform self-directed math practice at least five times per week through systematic explicit learning modules provided on mobile platforms
Learners can connect and explain over 70% of learned content to real-world work scenarios through weekly digital math game activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
